algorithm_technique: Two pointers with index tracking for strings and arrays
problem_summary_simple: Determine if concatenating strings in two arrays results in the same overall string.
problem_summary_technical: Uses four pointers to iterate through characters of strings within arrays, comparing them sequentially.
time_complexity: O(N), where N is the total number of characters in both arrays
key_insights: Avoid explicitly concatenating the strings to save memory, especially for large inputs.
Use pointers to track the current character within the current string and the current string within the array.
The comparison proceeds character by character across both arrays simultaneously.
